00001 /*
00002  * Streambuf manip
00003  */

00005 struct GenericIntBuf {
00006         u32 buffer_mask;
00007         int iput;
00008         int iget;
00009         int iputback;             // is previous get pointer
00010 
00011         // diagnostics
00012         int iswrapped;
00013         int nwrapped;             // # times it has wrapped         
00014         int hitide;               // max detected samples in stream
00015         int qpresent;             // current state of the Q
00016         spinlock_t lock;
00017         u32 buffers[0];           // MUST BE LAST!
00018 };
00019 #define NSTREAMBUF (1<<7)
00020 
00021 
00022 struct StreamBuf {
00023         struct GenericIntBuf def;
00024         u32 _buffers[NSTREAMBUF];
00025 };
00026 
00027 
00028 #define NSTATBUF   (1<<4)
00029 struct StatBuf {
00030         struct GenericIntBuf def;
00031         u32 _buffers[NSTATBUF];
00032 };
00033 
00034 struct AppBuf {
00035         char* buf;
00036         size_t count_max;
00037         size_t count_actual;
00038 };
00039 
00040 #define STREAM_MFA_INVALID 0xFFFFFFFFU
00041 
00042 #ifdef PGMCOMOUT
00043 static inline void streamDump( struct StreamBuf* stream_buf, char* caller ) {
00044         PDEBUGL(0)( "%10s p:%d g:%d\n", caller, stream_buf->iput, stream_buf->iget );
00045 }
00046 #else
00047 #define streamDump( a, b )
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 static inline void genericIntBufInit( struct GenericIntBuf* buf, int nbuf ){
00051         buf->iput = buf->iget = buf->iputback = 0;
00052         buf->buffer_mask = nbuf - 1;
00053         spin_lock_init(&buf->lock);
00054 }
00055 static inline int genericIntBufInc( struct GenericIntBuf* buf, int ii ){
00056         return (ii+1)&buf->buffer_mask;
00057 }
00058 static inline int genericIntBufIsFull( struct GenericIntBuf* buf ){
00059         return genericIntBufInc( buf, buf->iput ) == buf->iputback;
00060 }
00061 
00062 static inline int genericIntBufIsEmpty( struct GenericIntBuf* buf ){
00063         return buf->iget == buf->iput;
00064 }
00065 static inline int genericIntBufPut( struct GenericIntBuf* buf, u32 data ){
00066         if ( !genericIntBufIsFull( buf ) ){
00067                 int iput;
00068 
00069                 streamDump( buf, "streamPut()" );
00070                 buf->buffers[buf->iput] = data;
00071                 iput = genericIntBufInc( buf, buf->iput );
00072                 if ( iput < buf->iput ){
00073                         buf->iswrapped = 1;
00074                         buf->nwrapped++;
00075                 }
00076                 buf->iput = iput;
00077                 return 0;
00078         }else{
00079                 streamDump( buf, "streamPut()E" );
00080                 return -1;
00081         }
00082 }
00083 static inline u32 genericIntBufGet( struct GenericIntBuf* buf ){
00084         if ( !genericIntBufIsEmpty( buf ) ){
00085                 u32 data;
00086                 unsigned long flags;
00087 
00088                 streamDump( buf, "streamGet()" );
00089 
00090                 spin_lock_irqsave(&buf->lock, flags); 
00091                 {
00092                         data = buf->buffers[buf->iget];
00093                         buf->iputback = buf->iget;
00094                         buf->iget = genericIntBufInc( buf, buf->iget );
00095                 }
00096                 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&buf->lock, flags);
00097                 return data;
00098         }else{
00099                 streamDump( buf, "streamGet()E" );
00100                 return STREAM_MFA_INVALID;
00101         }
00102 }
00103 static inline void genericIntBufPutBack( struct GenericIntBuf* buf )
00104 // puts last buffer from streamGet() back on the Q
00105 {
00106         buf->iget = buf->iputback;
00107 }
00108 static inline int genericIntBufNumEntries( struct GenericIntBuf* buf )
00109 // returns # entries in buffer NB: unguarded!
00110 {
00111         int entries = 0;
00112         int iget = buf->iget;
00113 
00114         while ( iget != buf->iput ){
00115                 iget = genericIntBufInc( buf, iget );
00116                 ++entries;
00117         }
00118 
00119         return entries;
00120 }
00121 
00122 static inline void streamBufInit( struct StreamBuf* stream_buf ){
00123         genericIntBufInit( &stream_buf->def, NSTREAMBUF );
00124 }
00125 static inline int streamPut( struct StreamBuf* stream_buf, u32 data ){
00126         return genericIntBufPut( &stream_buf->def, data );
00127 }
00128 static inline u32 streamGet( struct StreamBuf* stream_buf ){
00129         return genericIntBufGet( &stream_buf->def );
00130 }
00131 static inline void streamPutBack( struct StreamBuf* stream_buf )
00132 // puts last buffer from streamGet() back on the Q
00133 {
00134         genericIntBufPutBack( &stream_buf->def );
00135 }
00136 static inline int streamNumEntries( struct StreamBuf* stream_buf )
00137 // returns # entries in buffer NB: expensive!
00138 {
00139         return genericIntBufNumEntries( &stream_buf->def );
00140 }
00141 
00142 static inline int statbufPut( struct StatBuf* stat_buf, u32 data ) {
00143         return genericIntBufPut( &stat_buf->def, data );
00144 }
00145 static inline u32 statbufGet( struct StatBuf* stat_buf ){
00146         return genericIntBufGet( &stat_buf->def );
00147 }
00148 static inline int statbufIsEmpty( struct StatBuf* stat_buf ){
00149         return genericIntBufIsEmpty( &stat_buf->def );
00150 }
00151 
00152 static inline void statBufInit( struct StatBuf* buf ){
00153         genericIntBufInit( &buf->def, NSTATBUF );
00154 }
00155 static inline void appbufInit( struct AppBuf* app_buf ) {
00156         app_buf->count_max = app_buf->count_actual = 0;
00157 }
